program codeforces_412_A

    implicit none

    integer :: n, k, i

    character(len=200) :: a

    ! Read input

    read(*,*) n, k

    read(*,*) a

    ! First part movement.

    if (k > n/2) then 

        do while (k <n) 

            print *, 'RIGHT'

            k = k + 1 

        end do 

    else 

        do while (k >1) 

            print *, 'LEFT'

            k =k -1

        end do 

    end if 

    ! Then the printing part.

    if (k ==1) then 

        integer :: len_a = len_trim(a)

        do i =1, len_a 

            print *, 'PRINT '//a(i:i)

            if (i < len_a ) then 

                print *, 'RIGHT'

            end if 

        end do 

    else 

        integer :: len_a = len_trim(a)

        do i = len_a,1, -1 

            print *, 'PRINT '// a(i:i) 

            if (i >1 ) then 

                print *, 'LEFT'

            end if 

        end do 

    end if 

end program codeforces_412_A
